MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.04am due to a broken overhead line near to Whitehaugh and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the overhead line affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.53am on Wednesday 7th April 2021.
